7200.name: The Treasury
7200.description:
This is a small but well equipped treasury. Visible is some writing on
the wall. The ceiling has a funny glow, which enables you to see. You
can get back into the inner lair through the stone door which is east.
Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

east.description: You look back through the opening into the inner lair.

7201.name: The Inner Lair
7201.description:
This is a octagonal room with smooth purple stone walls. The floor is
made from black stone. In the western wall you see a large black stone
door. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold
to the touch.

south.description: You look back through the door into the lair.

west.description: You see the treasury.

7202.name: The Lair
7202.description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You
also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
To the north is a wooden door. The sounds of city life echo around.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: You can see the inner lair.

east.description: You see another part of the lair.

south.description: You see another part of the lair.

7203.name: The Lair
7203.description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You
also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth
by countless feet.

north.description: You see another part of the lair.

east.description: You see another part of the lair.

south.description: You see another part of the lair.

7204.name: The Lair
7204.description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You
also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all
sides.

north.description: You see another part of the lair.

east.description: You see another part of the lair.

south.description: You see the lair entrance.

7205.name: The Lair
7205.description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You
also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are
worn smooth by countless feet.

south.description: You see another part of the lair.

west.description: You see another part of the lair.

7206.name: The Lair
7206.description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You
also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air.

north.description: You see another part of the lair.

south.description: You see another part of the lair.

west.description: You see another part of the lair.

7207.name: The Lair
7207.description:
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You
also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past.

north.description: You see another part of the lair.

west.description: You see another part of the lair.

7208.name: The Lair Entrance
7208.description:
This is a dry part of the sewer. To the north is a wooden door, you can
see some slime at the lower part of the door. You also see some skulls
and some broken bones. Wildflowers dot the landscape. The ground is soft
underfoot.

north.description: You can see the lair.

east.description: You see a crawlway.

7209.name: The Crawlway
7209.description:
This is a narrow crawlway. It is rather boring here. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: You see a four-way junction.

west.description: You see the entrance to a lair.

7210.name: The Four-Way Junction
7210.description:
This is a sewer junction. To the north is a small hole, to the west is a
narrow crawlway and to the east and south the sewer continues. Bird
calls echo through the canopy. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: You can see a small cave-like room.

east.description: You can see a sewer drain.

south.description: You can see a sewer drain.

west.description: You can see a narrow crawlway.

7211.name: The Small Cave
7211.description:
This is a collapsed sewer drain, which now is more like a small cave.
The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air.

south.description: You look back into the four-way junction.

7212.name: The Sewer Drain
7212.description:
This is a dry sewer drain which bends to the north. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air.

north.description: You can see the drain continuing north.

west.description: You can see the four-way junction.

7213.name: The Sewer Drain
7213.description:
This is a dry sewer drain which bends to the east. Bird calls echo
through the canopy. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.
Trees crowd together, their branches filtering the light. The forest
floor is soft with fallen leaves.

east.description: You can see the drain continuing east.

south.description: You can see the drain continuing south.

7214.name: The End Of The Drain
7214.description:
This is the end of the drain around the sewer has collapsed, the only
exit is west. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The
scent of pine and earth fills the air.

west.description: You see the sewer drain.

7215.name: The Half-Wet Drain
7215.description:
This is a sewer drain where the floor is covered with water. To the
north it looks more dry, south however the drain runs down into some
water. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. The view stretches for miles in
every direction.

north.description: To the north lies a dry four-way junction.

south.description: To the south you see a sewer drain filled with water.

7216.name: Under Water In The Sewer
7216.description:
The area is swimming in some dirty water and are holding your breath.
You'd better continue onwards before drown. It is a good thing that you
can hold your light above the water-level. Sunlight sparkles on the
water. Ripples spread across the surface.

north.description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs slightly upwards.

south.description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs a little bit upwards.

7217.name: The Half-Dry Drain
7217.description:
This is a half-dry sewer drain. To the north the drain runs a little bit
downwards into some water to the east Visible is a small hole. To the
west you see another drain. The view stretches for miles in every
direction. The wind carries the scent of wild herbs.

north.description: You see the drain running down into some water.

east.description: Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.

west.description: You see a drain running to the west.

7218.name: The Very Small Room
7218.description:
This is a very small room, it is pretty uninteresting. Ancient trees
rise on all sides. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.
Trees crowd together, their branches filtering the light. The forest
floor is soft with fallen leaves.

west.description: Through the little hole you can see a half-dry drain.

7219.name: A Dry Sewer Drain
7219.description:
This is a dry but dirty sewer drain. The drain continues east and south.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves.

east.description: You see a half-dry drain.

south.description: You see another boring sewer drain.

7220.name: A Boring Drain
7220.description:
This drain connects to the larger sewer system, exactly as mundane as
you'd expect. Slime coats the curved walls, and the constant trickle of
questionable fluids echoes in the confined space. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: You see a sewer drain continuing to the north.

east.description: You can see another drain to the east.

7221.name: The Sewer Drain
7221.description:
This is a sewer drain, there is nothing special in here, except for a
loud echo. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls
echo through the canopy.

east.description: You can see another sewer drain.

west.description: You can make out a sewer drain to the west.

up.description: You can see a sewer line.

7222.name: The Sewer Drain
7222.description:
This is a drain, with some slimy water on the floor. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light.

east.description: You see a sewer bend.

west.description: You see a sewer drain.

7223.name: The Sewer Bend
7223.description:
The passage opens in an ordinary sewer bend, which bends from west to
north. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. The forest
floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: You see a sewer drain.

west.description: You see a sewer drain.

7224.name: The Sewer Junction
7224.description:
The area opens in a junction of three sewer drains. You see some odd
scratches on the pipe wall, as if from a gigantic rat. North and south
the sewer continues as usual, but west it looks a little strange. Bird
calls echo through the canopy. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

north.description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.

south.description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.

west.description: You see a strange sewer pipe.

7225.name: The Sewer
7225.description:
This is a sewer, where the slimy water runs down through a tiny hole.
You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat.
There is a sewer drain south. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird
calls echo through the canopy.

south.description: You see a sewer drain.

7229.name: The Strange Sewer
7229.description:
This is a very strange sewer indeed, there are some odd scratches on the
pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. And Visible is a lot of organic decay
like bones from animals AND humans. West the drain runs slightly
upwards. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Ancient trees rise on all
sides.

east.description: You see a sewer junction.

west.description: You see a slimy sewer drain.

7230.name: The Damp Sewer
7230.description:
This is a sewer drain with a funny damp substance on the floor, in the
substance you see a lot of decay. You see some odd scratches on the
wall, as if from a gigantic rat. Both to the east and west the pipe
seems to run down. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.
Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: You see a sewer.

west.description: You see a sewer.

7231.name: The Strange Sewer
7231.description:
This is an ordinary sewer except for a lot of scratches on the sewer
wall, and a lot of debris on the floor. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: You see a sewer.

west.description: You see another sewer.

7232.name: The Sewer
7232.description:
This is a sewer with more scratches on the walls. And of course a whole
lot of decay. The drain runs east and north. The scent of pine and earth
fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: You see yet another sewer line.

east.description: You see a sewer pipe.

7233.name: The Sewer Drain
7233.description:
The area opens in a sewer drain, you are able to see some kind of cave-
like room. You see some odd scratches on the drain wall, as if from a
gigantic rat. The sewer leads south. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: You see a cave-like room.

south.description: You see a sewer.

7234.name: The Rat's Lair
7234.description:
This is a little cave. The area is able to see quite a lot of debris on
the floor. There is a sewer drain west of here. Bird calls echo through
the canopy. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

west.description: You see the sewer system that way.

7279.name: The Wall Of The Abyss
7279.description:
You hang onto some steps leading down into utter darkness. There is an
exit leading up as well, though you'll have to open the tiny rock again
to do so. The wind howls around exposed peaks. The path is steep and
treacherous.

up.description: The Southwestern Corner Of The Ledge

down.description: A steep trail ascends to On The Walls Of The Abyss

7280.name: The Entrance
7280.description:
This is a very dark room. You notice that some faces are staring at you
from inside the walls. In the middle of the room there is a small altar.
To the north there is a small round door. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A beam of red light seeps through a hole in the door.

up.description: The Northeastern Corner Of The Ledge

7281.name: The Corridor
7281.description:
The corridor is glowing oppressively in a red hue. You can hear wailing
through an open black hole to the east. To the south there is a round
door. The sounds of city life echo around. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

east.description: The hole seems more black than the night.  It is appears to be "eating" the red light around it.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Entrance

7282.name: The Realm Of Lost Souls
7282.description:
This is nothing. All around there are stars. Sometimes a shadow flies
closely by you, wailing very loudly. To the north there is a small
bright hole. To the west there is a small red hole. The air is still and
musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: You look into a very bright hole.

west.description: You look into a red hole.

7283.name: The T-Crossing
7283.description:
This is a small hallway. There are doors to the east and to the west. To
the south there are a black hole. There is writing in the wall. Wails
can be heard from the south. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The
sounds of city life echo around.

east.description: It is too dark to tell.

south.description: A black hole in the wall.

west.description: You can see a big fire to the west.  It looks like a unhealthy place to enter!

7284.name: The Firedeath
7284.description:
This room is very hot. There are flames surrounding you. Visible is no
exits at all! Skeletons are lying all over the floor. The cobblestones
are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

7285.name: The Torture Room
7285.description:
This is a middle of a square room. Along the walls skeletons are hanging
in rusty chains. In the middle of the room there is a big metal box,
covered with dust. To the south you can just make out a small exit. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd together
on all sides.

south.description: It is too dark to tell.

7286.name: The Hell Yard
7286.description:
This is a lot of mud. A disgusting smell surrounds the place, and makes
you feel sick. Small flames sometimes shoot up from the hot mud. To the
west there is a small door. To the north Visible is an iron door. Bare
rock dominates the landscape. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: It is too dark to tell.

west.description: It is too dark to tell.

7299.name: On The Walls Of The Abyss
7299.description:
The area is clutching the steps on the wall so that you don't fall to
the ground down below. You cannot see anymore handholds below and thus
this stops your journey down, as the only exit is up. The air is thin
and cold at this altitude. The path is steep and treacherous.

up.description: A steep trail ascends to The Wall Of The Abyss

7300.name: Cave Entrance
7300.description:
This is the cave entrance. It is very dark down here. There is writing
on the wall. There is an exit to the north. A stairway leads up. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

north.description: To the north you can see a small tunnel.

up.description: You can see the stairs going up into darkness.

7301.name: Cave Tunnel
7301.description:
The way continues in a tunnel. It is very cold. You can feel the
presence of a living thing... SOMEWHERE. The sounds of city life echo
around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: To the north you can see the tunnel continuing.

south.description: To the south tunnel continuing.

7302.name: Cave Room
7302.description:
This is a room. It is much cooler now. The walls are glowing. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life echo around.

east.description: To the east you see the tunnel going downwards.

south.description: To the south you see a dark cave tunnel.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The East Tunnel

7303.name: The Cave T-Cross
7303.description:
This is a mudlike substance. The smell here is awful, it is rotten. To
the west Visible is some light. The air is fresh and clean. The ground
is soft underfoot.

east.description: To the east the tunnel still goes downwards.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Long Tunnel

west.description: You can see some light to the west.

7304.name: The Cave Turning-Point
7304.description:
The mud is getting deeper. The area is wondering, 'Would it be an idea
to leave, before I disappear?'. To the south you notice a flat round
stone is blocking the way. To the west Visible is mud. The air is fresh
and clean. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

south.description: You can see an opening behind the stone.

west.description: An open path leads to The Cave T-Cross

7305.name: The Secret Room
7305.description:
There is dust all over the place. It looks like nobody has been here for
ages. In the middle of the room you see a socket with a crystal globe.
The globe glows with a pulsing light. To the north you see a stone door.
To the south you see a grey block. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: You see a round stone door.

south.description: You see a grey block.

7306.name: The Mudhole
7306.description:
This is a lot of mud. The mud goes to your chest. You feel the presence
of something IN the mud. The only obvious exit is to the west. The water
is cool and clear. Fish dart beneath the waves.

north.description: You can see nothing at all.

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Tunnel

7307.name: A Tunnel
7307.description:
The mud goes to your knees. Otherwise the tunnel looks very normal. Bare
rock dominates the landscape. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.
The rocky terrain is steep and unforgiving. Thin air makes breathing
difficult.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Long Tunnel

east.description: You can see a mudhole.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Hot Room

7308.name: The Long Tunnel
7308.description:
Here there is almost no mud, as you stand at the top of a small rock.
Just nearby there are a sign which says 'WARNING! The worms are
dangerous!' The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The sounds
of city life echo around.

north.description: You can see a lot of mud... Yuck!

south.description: The tunnel goes a little downwards.

7309.name: The Hot Room
7309.description:
The area is very surprised, as this room for a change are hot instead of
cold. To the north it goes downwards into some mud. There are also an
exit to the west. The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: You see a lot of mud.

west.description: You see a entrance to a small room.

7310.name: The Small Room
7310.description:
As you look around notice a small statue. There are exits to the
west and to the east. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: It is pitch dark out there.

west.description: You see a VERY long hallway.

7311.name: The Stalagmite Cave
7311.description:
This is a stalagmite cave. Water is dripping from the walls. It is very
cold in here. The air is fresh and clean. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Stalagmite T-Cross

east.description: You see a long hallway, and some mud.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Stalagmite Tunnel

7312.name: The Stalagmite Tunnel
7312.description:
You has entered a small tunnel. Here it is quite dry. Maybe it would be
a good idea to rest here. The sounds of city life echo around.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: You can see a small cave to the north.

west.description: A trail winds toward The Spongy Room

7313.name: The Spongy Room
7313.description:
You definitely do NOT like this area. It is very dank, and most of the
room is wet. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Ancient trees rise on
all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Stalagmite Tunnel

west.description: The water flows toward The Pool

7314.name: The Stalagmite T-Cross
7314.description:
This is a cross. To the north Visible is some light. Otherwise it is
dark. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: You see some light ahead.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Blind End Room

south.description: An open path leads to The Stalagmite Cave

7315.name: The Blind End Room
7315.description:
This room is obviously a blind end. To the north you see a primitive
picture. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life
echo around.

north.description: You see a primitive picture of some people dancing around a huge sun.  The sun is about 7 feet in diameter, which shows the size of the picture.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Stalagmite T-Cross

7316.name: The Treasure Room
7316.description:
This room is richly ornamented. The walls have been carved to show
people dancing around a moon which is drawn on the floor. It looks very
old, and it is very dusty. To the south you see the back side of a
secret door. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones are
worn smooth by countless feet.

south.description: You can see a picture with some peeple crawling around a huge moon.

7317.name: The Square Lair
7317.description:
This is the south-east part of the lair. Visible is a skeleton lying in
the corner. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: Another part of the lair.

west.description: Another part of the lair.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Stalagmite T-Cross

7318.name: The Square Lair
7318.description:
This is the north-east part of the lair. You see a sign on the wall.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all
sides.

east.description: You see a wooden door.

south.description: Another part of the lair.

west.description: Another part of the lair.

7319.name: The Square Lair
7319.description:
This is the north-west part of the lair. Here there is another sign.
There is an exit from the lair to the north. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: You see a small tunnel leading north.

east.description: Another part of the lair.

south.description: Another part of the lair.

7321.name: The East Tunnel
7321.description:
This is dark tunnel, the exits are east and west. To the west you see a
wooden door. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air.

west.description: You can see a wooden door.

east.description: You can see a muddy tunnel.

7322.name: The North Tunnel
7322.description:
This is a dark tunnel, it leads upwards. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The dark tunnel continues.

south.description: You can see the lair.

west.description: You can see a cave entrance.

7323.name: The L-Shaped Room
7323.description:
This is deep darkness. To the south there is a small exit. To the east
Visible is a gaping hole. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Circular Hall

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The North Tunnel

7324.name: The Circular Hall
7324.description:
This is round hall. To the north, east and south Visible is a stone head
hanging on the walls. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: You see a red dragon's head hanging on the wall.

east.description: You see a green dragon's head hanging on the wall.

south.description: You see a blue dragon's head hanging on the wall.

west.description: You see a room far away.

7325.name: A Dusty Tunnel
7325.description:
This is dust. This place has not been touched for a long time. Otherwise
it is quite boring here, looks like a place to rest! To the west you see
the outline of a door. A tunnel leads to the east. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: You see a tunnel which leads downwards.  It is quite dark.

west.description: You can see the outline of a door.  Just like in the description!

7326.name: The Crossing
7326.description:
This is a crossing of hallways. You can leave this place in every
direction, except up and down. In the dust you notice strange
footprints. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Glittering Room

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Windy Tunnel

south.description: A passage leads to A Narrow Sewer Passage

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dusty Tunnel

7328.name: The Dragon's Lair
7328.description:
Visible is burned walls, the floorstones are fiery red. All kinds of
bones are scattered all over the floor. On the walls Visible is some
burned shapes. You smell burnt flesh. Two creatures are half melted into
the floor. The open sky stretches overhead. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

north.description: You can see a long tunnel.

west.description: You can see nothing but darkness.

7330.name: The Windy Tunnel
7330.description:
This is a tunnel. above, you can feel a breeze. The sounds of city life
echo around. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: It is too dark to tell.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Crossing

7331.name: The Glittering Room
7331.description:
This room is very bright. On the walls Visible is some silver. Exits are
west, east and south. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Secret Passageway

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Crossing

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The End Of Long Tunnel

7332.name: The Secret Passageway
7332.description:
The entrance opens to a tiny room. There is only an exit to the west.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd
together on all sides.

west.description: You can see a light to the west.

7333.name: The End Of Long Tunnel
7333.description:
This is a end of a long tunnel. Right ahead, Visible is a grey mass. To
the east Visible is a tremendously long tunnel, but you know that, you
were just there. The air is thin and cold at this altitude. Snow clings
to shadowed crevices.

east.description: A long tunnel.  JUST like in the description!

west.description: A grey mass is blocking the way.

7334.name: The Stair-Room
7334.description:
This is a small room. Drawings of faces in pain are on the walls. You
can feel that darkness is ruling the place. There is one exit: south.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air.

south.description: Nothing but darkness...

7335.name: A Dark Tunnel
7335.description:
This is a dark tunnel. It continues to the north and to the south. Bones
are spread on the floor. The sounds of city life echo around. The smell
of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Stair-Room

south.description: An open path leads to The Entrance To The Lair

7336.name: The Entrance To The Lair
7336.description:
The smell here is awful. To the south Visible is some smoke. A tunnel
leads north and east. The air is fresh and clean. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Tunnel

south.description: The only thing you can see is smoke.

east.description: A small cave is to the east.

7337.name: The North-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
7337.description:
It is hard to see here because of the smoke. To the north you can barely
see a small tunnel. Other exits are to the south and to the west. The
ground is soft underfoot. The open sky stretches overhead.

north.description: An open path leads to The Entrance To The Lair

south.description: The South-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

west.description: The North-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

7338.name: The South-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
7338.description:
There is a very small hole in wall from which the smoke is coming from.
Otherwise it is pitch black. Exits are north and west. Wildflowers dot
the landscape. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: You can see nothing but smoke.

west.description: You can see nothing but smoke.

7339.name: The North-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
7339.description:
Visible is some hay spread on the floor. The smell is awful here, and it
makes you feel sick. This place where the Basilisk sleeps. Watch out...
maybe it is not far from here... Wildflowers dot the landscape. Tall
grass sways in a gentle breeze.

east.description: The North-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

south.description: The South-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

7340.name: The South-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
7340.description:
The southwestern corner of the basilisk's massive cave lair stretches
before. Ancient stone bears deep claw marks, and the air reeks of
reptile musk. Bones crunch underfoot - remains of previous victims. Snow
clings to shadowed crevices. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

north.description: The North-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

east.description: The South-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave

south.description: An open path leads to The Small Cave

7341.name: The Small Cave
7341.description:
This is small cave. Visible is some light at the end. Exits are north
and south. The open sky stretches overhead. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze.

north.description: You can see only smoke.

south.description: You can see a blue glow.  And you feel a fresh breeze... ahhhh...

7342.name: The Northern End Of The Pool
7342.description:
You have wet feet, you are standing in water. The water looks calm. You
can see that it is a big lake. Light seeps from the water. The wind
carries the scent of wild herbs. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks.

north.description: You can see a small cave.

east.description: You can see more water.

south.description: You can see water.

7343.name: The Pool
7343.description:
The area is swimming in water. It is getting deep here. It is also dark
in this end. The water is cool and clear. The current tugs gently at
your limbs.

south.description: You can see some bubbles in the water.

west.description: You see calm water.

7344.name: The South End Of The Pool
7344.description:
The area opensing in water up to your neck! You can only see water. The
air is thin and cold at this altitude. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.
The rocky terrain is steep and unforgiving. Thin air makes breathing
difficult.

north.description: You can see calm water.

east.description: To dark to tell, but you can feel something nearby.

south.description: You feel a faint current pulling south.

7345.name: The Pool
7345.description:
The area is swimming in DARKNESS. You feel something touching the other
side leg. Fish dart beneath the waves. Ripples spread across the
surface. The water ripples and shifts around. Light plays across the
surface.

north.description: To dark to tell.

east.description: You can feel a warm breeze.

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The South End Of The Pool

7320.name: A Flooded Sewer Junction
7320.description: Murky water sloshes around your ankles at this junction in the sewer maze. Tunnels branch off in several directions, and the sound of dripping water echoes endlessly.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Square Lair

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Square Lair

7327.name: A Narrow Sewer Passage
7327.description: The sewer narrows here, forcing you to duck under low-hanging pipes. The walls are slick with moisture and something unidentifiable.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Crossing

east.description: An open path leads to The Dragon's Lair

7329.name: A Wide Sewer Chamber
7329.description: The tunnel opens into a wider chamber. Scratches and scorch marks mar the walls, suggesting something large has been through here recently.

south.description: An open path leads to The Dragon's Lair

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Windy Tunnel

7200.name: mindflayer
7200.long_desc: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.
7200.description:
It is a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a
black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any
moment now.  In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.

7201.name: mindflayer
7201.long_desc: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.
7201.description:
This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high.  Dressed in purple and black,
and carrying a large mace in its hand.  In the center of its head are four
large tentacles with very sharp points.

7202.name: mindflayer
7202.long_desc: The junior mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.
7202.description:
This mindflayer is six feet high.  It has a small mace in its belt, and is
dressed in purple and black cloth.  It has four small tentacles in the center
of its head.

7203.name: wererat
7203.long_desc: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.
7203.description:
The wererat is about four feet tall.  It looks very much like rat, except
that it is standing.

7204.name: rat
7204.long_desc: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.
7204.description:
The gigantic rat is about ten feet long from head to tail and has claws the
size of your head, looking very nasty.

7205.name: sewer bat
7205.long_desc: A large bat hangs from the ceiling, watching you.
7205.description: This oversized bat has adapted to the sewers, its eyes gleaming red in the darkness.

7206.name: sewer snake
7206.long_desc: A large snake slithers through the muck.
7206.description: This snake has grown fat on rats and refuse. Its scales are slick with sewer water.

7207.name: giant sewer rat
7207.long_desc: A rat the size of a dog snarls at you.
7207.description: This massive rat has grown to unnatural size in the sewers. Its eyes gleam with feral cunning.

7208.name: basilisk
7208.long_desc: A basilisk lurks in the shadows, its deadly gaze fixed on you.
7208.description: This reptilian horror has scales like rusted iron. Its gaze seems to bore into your soul.

7298.name: maintenance worker
7298.long_desc: A bored-looking city maintenance worker stands here, holding a faded map of the sewer system.
7298.description: He wears thick leather boots, heavy gloves, and a resigned expression. A lantern on his belt provides steady light, and his tools jingle with every movement.

talk_responses.hello: The worker sighs. 'Another adventurer. Look, I don't care what you're hunting down here — just don't break any more pipes. The west passages flood regularly, so watch for rising water. And whatever you do, avoid the deep cistern. Something moved in there last week. Something big.'
talk_responses.cistern: He shakes his head. 'I'm paid to fix pipes, not fight monsters. But I'll tell you this — the noise from the cistern started about a month ago. Whatever's down there, it's getting bigger.'
talk_responses.default: The worker marks something on his map and mutters about overtime pay.

7200.name: rod
7200.room_desc: The mysterious devil rod lies on the floor.

7202.name: mace
7202.room_desc: a small mace has been left here.

7203.name: cloak
7203.room_desc: A purple cloak lies on the floor.

7204.name: potion
7204.room_desc: A neon blue potion stands on the floor.

7205.name: key
7205.room_desc: A black key has been left on the floor.

7206.name: skull
7206.room_desc: A strange white skull lies on the floor looking at you.

7207.name: gauntlets
7207.room_desc: A pair of muddy gauntlets have been thrown away here.

7209.name: boots
7209.room_desc: A pair of muddy boots has been dropped here.

7210.name: treasure
7210.room_desc: There is a huge treasure here, looking very valuable.

7211.name: sword
7211.room_desc: A short sword is lying here.
